mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (username, email, password, name, createdAt, updatedAt, role) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password, name, role, profileImgUrl, birthDate, createdAt, updatedAt FROM USER WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET profileImgUrl = #{profileImgUrl}, birthDate = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE username = #{username}
